Title: CASE OF N. v. SWEDEN
Conclusion(s): Violation of Art. 3 (in case of expulsion to Afghanistan)

Vilvarajah and Others v. the United Kingdom, judgment of 30 October 1991, Series A no. 215, § 108 in fine
